original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa🔽Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)🔽21.44. Lokiyaduka, Sanidassanattika🔽Nalokiyaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.🔽Nalokuttaraṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.🔽(Gaṇitakena gaṇetabbā tīṇi pañhā. Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Nalokiyaṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo anidassanasappaṭigho ….
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi  lokiya duka sani dassana ttika  na lokiyam na sa nidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca lokiyaḥ sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka  na lokuttaram na sa nidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca lokiyaḥ sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka  gaṇitakena gaṇetabbā tīṇi pañhā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi  na lokiyam na anidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca lokiyaḥ anidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: (Tīṇiyeva pañhā kātabbā. Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe🔽ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: tīṇiyeva pañhā kātabbā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe aññamaññe 🔽ekam pe a vigate tīṇi

original: Nalokuttaraṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na lokuttaram na anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca lokiyaḥ anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate eka
translated: With a supramundane non-revealing and non-hindering dhammas as condition, a mundane non-revealing and non-hindering dhammas arises, by way of root-cause condition. (In brief.) As root-cause, one; as predominance, one; … as non-hindrance, one.
